11.content:
Jackie held her head low as she exited the sumo dojo. Yet again she failed to enroll, being naturally skinny proved quite problematic for a girl yearning to defeat the sumo champ. Jackie grabbed at her insignificant single belly roll in frustration.

"Dammit! I'm still underweight!" Jackie cried out "Even after eating all those extra meals, I'm still below the weight requirements."

The female sumo circuit had instituted a weight requirement a few years earlier. This was due to multiple deaths, all of which happened to Jackie's older sisters. Jackie was the youngest of a set of sisters who possessed a prowess for sumo wrestling. Inspite of their thin bodies, they were agile enough to throw heavier girls off. Until they faced Ann, a girl well into obesity. No matter how innately skilled they were, their pathetic weights proved futile compared to the indomitable girth of Ann. Each sisters' overconfidence led them to their deaths. The committee was unable to overlook the fact that every girl who died was thin, much lighter than their competitors and thus installed a weight requirement.

Alone, Jackie was left with nothing other than the resolve to avenge her sisters. Regarding her older sisters' thin bodies as a weakness, Jackie started to heavily eat with the intention of becoming fatter than any of her sisters. Unfortunately Jackie, like her sisters, were genetically slender. Despite that inconvenience, Jackie remained determined to plump up.

As Jackie walked away from the dojo, she was greeted by her two best friends Frankie and Shaina who felt obligated to lift her spirits.

"Didn't make it." Frankie asked noticing Jackie's apparent dejection.

"Grrrr why am I so skinny!? I eat and eat but I'm only 138 pounds." snarled the aspiring sumo girl.

"Hey look registration is open all week. How much more do you have to gain?" Shaina gently asked.

"Girls have to weigh at least 160 pounds to enlist." pouted Jackie. "How could I possibly gain 22pounds in a few days?"

Frankie clutched several coupons in her pocket knowing they couldn't fulfill such a large gain. "It may not work but I do have coupons for some nice greasy burgers."

A small smile grew on Jackie's face. "Yeah...Let's go have some burgers."

Jackie's spirits were slightly lifted from her friend's kind gesture. Throwing her arms over her friends and squeezing them close, the three girls went to the fastfood joint and all three ate their fill.

You remembered the obnoxious girls who literally poked fun at your fat, even some of the chubbier ones mocked you, your friend Tina having to shoo them off on more then one occasion and even now the cashier didn't mean to stare at your flab but they did after you made your huge order...well time to show everyone what real fat was.

"Wonder if this place's insurance covers random acts of fattening, well time to find out."

You wonder out loud as you activate your new fattening powers, your stomach rapidly draping over the table pushing your fattening chest closer to your now multiplying chins, your massive rear stretching right out of your extended sweat pants flowing over your seat.

You relax your thickening arms and legs to simply ride out your growth, the table bending and breaking from belly weight while your backside floods your seat with fat you're already attracting a crowd as your growing body replaces the booth entirely, customers and workers now freaking out as you continue to grow onward you truly are starting to become some sort of human blob as your stomach rolls over another booth in front of you while your massive butt does the same to the one build behind you.

An embarrassing soft moan leaves your lips as you further demolish the dinning area, all those around your surging girth panicking and screaming several running for the main door before your flab can seal them inside. others running out the emergency exits, and even one worker somehow diving right out the drive-through window which was an impressive feat in and of itself.

As people flee you continue to grow onward, your cheeks filled with fat as you rest your head on the blob of blubber your body is becoming, more and more of the place surrendering itself to your unstoppable flab as you feel the remaining booths and even the cash registers bend to your fat will your blubber now stretching into the kitchen. Amazingly despite what may be considered dangerous to exposed flesh is nothing to your powerful mass as ovens, fryers, and any other appliances related to cooking is crushed and grind down as if the cooking ware was food itself.

Soon enough you're filling the entirety of the building with yourself, windows shattering as sacks of blubber squeeze right out it wouldn't be long before you power your way right out of the weakening restaurant.

"Mount Paige will not be contained,"

You exclaimed as you push forward your growth with a growl your mighty tons of fat surging outward as the building finally came tumbling down and yet no harm would come to you thanks to your massive meat shield, so to speak.

The restaurant was no more now in it's place stood well you a completely massive blob of a girl, your final surge had pushed you so far you could feel a portion of the parking lot and streets blanket by fat.

You could still hear a commotion around you but you ignored it instead soaking in the feeling of being so amazingly fat.
15421222.title: Become the blob! Make the city tremble beneath ...

choices: You continue your chaotic fattening spree
You notice your best friend has stumbled upon the scene you've caused
154212222.content:
Eventually the euphoric feeling you were experiencing from your building-busting growth begins to come to a close and in it's place you start to hear the sounds of the public in the area very clearly panicking at your blob of body.

The phrase "chickens without their heads" came to mind as you watched your audience scurry and shuffle about like madmen/women. You feel no shame in that the sight amuses you, that said in the distance you hear sirens no doubt law enforcement, fire fighters, and rescue workers. Funny enough no one really need saving and there was no way anyone on their way would be able to do anything for you hell you could change back right now if you wanted but instead a sly smile crept on your tubby face as a wonderful idea came to mind.

The people were already in a frenzy why not take advantage of it.

"You guys need to calm down a bit let me help with that."

You state to no one in particular as your power activates causing several women to plump up! Some shattering their shoes in the process while others see their dresses rip right in half as a yoga-ball of a gut suddenly appears out of nowhere. One woman falls right onto her now big and growing butt, another stops by her car as her now heavy-set bottom half has tired her out, still another fall to the floor complaining to the sky as her figure bloats all over.

As all this is occurring you notice that law enforcement has arrived and obviously well in shock that "giant blob girl" wasn't a stupid internet troll call. Unsure how to handle you or the fattening spree you've caused they pause giving you a moment to yourself. You were fairly sure their weapons couldn't do a thing to do since you had just busted a building with yourself and came out without a scratch but just in case...

One of the officers suddenly begins to complain about her uniform pressing on her body when in a flash she quickly bursts right out of her clothing! Her fellow officers coming to her aid when they too begin bloating up in weight the men unsure what to do resorting to just trying to cover the ladies up as they swell up. You spot this however so to make sure the male officers are preoccupied you focus on an apartment complex nearby, smirking you really have at it.

In a near instant you hear the place rumble and tremble something is happening inside and you have to suppress your laughter as big blubbery bellies, butts, and breasts begin ripping the apartments apart! Women everywhere are growing enormous inside forcing the male officers to attempt some kind of rescue meanwhile that leaves the female cops to themselves as their fat forms collide with one another, one in particular already large enough to press flat a part of her cruiser.
154212222.title: Using your powers of fat on the panicked public

So you think make me fat enough to fit into my sister's clothes. You start to expand again growing even larger than before. By the time you stopped growing your breast were the of yoga ball,your butt could crush the couch if you tried to sit on it, your arms and legs looked more like tree trunks than limbs and you could probably fit two 400 pound people into your belly. You are speechless at how good it feels to be this huge. You grab one of her shirts and put it on fitting pefectly on you. Now that I have clothes hat should I do now.

1552.content:
Catherine "Cate" Baker

When she was a teenager, she was mocked for being very chubby. Not even fat, she realises now, just very chubby. She was called "Cake Baker" by her high school bullies. She moved away after graduation and when she moved back, recently, she had lost all that weight and become a very slim but muscular personal trainer. She soon tracked down all of her old high school bullies to hire herself out to help them stay slim.

What has actually happened is that Cate only looks like she's lost weight, but she's actually fatter than ever. When she gets her old bullies to hire her, she's actually making them imagine that they've lost weight and had workouts when, really, she's changed reality so that fat is popular and getting them to gorge, feeling humiliated about their skinny bodies.
1552.title: What about Cate?

info.brief_description: The gaining power has fallen into the hands of another girl!
info.description:
Note: This is a spin-off of my previous semi-successful story, Gaining Power, so I recommend reading at least some of that story before you read this one.

Note: This story is told in second-person view: therefore, YOU are thrust into the main character's shoes! Enjoy!


Characters:

Jackie: 138 pounds. Been trying to break into the sumo wrestling circuit to avenge her sisters, who were killed by Ann, a sumo weighing in at 586 pounds. She hasn't been able to gain enough weight to qualify, but that's about to change. By her side are her friends Frankie (125 pounds) and Shaina (132 pounds) who are willing to do anything or gain any number of pounds to help their friend.


Nicole: 117 pounds. A stick-like guitarist, who has always wondered how much weight could affect her performance- or those of her bandmates. Her bandmates themselves are Janie, the chubby 165 pound singer; Tess, the slim 121 pound drummer; and Gale, the huge 486 pound bassist, who loves every pound on her body and is trying to gain more every chance she gets. And with her new power, those wonders could become realities...


Jessica: 122 pounds. Trying to break into the modeling life, her weight has always been a hindrance in the world of unhealthy twigs- until she discovered the world of fat models. This new lifestyle is great; Jess loves to eat, she gets all of the hottest clothes before anyone else, and with her new power, she could be the fattest model anyone had ever met!


Katie: 238 pounds. As she loves to eat and loves being fat, the job of a chef is perfect for this pig. She likes to see her customers happy, and to her, they're only happy when they're full and fat. Her dream has come true when she gets the power of weight manipulation, which she can use to increase her customers' appetites or make them fat without making them eat; and it doesn't hurt that the hungry porkers are gonna be getting Katie a nice profit, either...


Sami: 175 pounds. Constantly looking for a job and playing video games almost all the time, Sami has a pretty laid-back life. She lives it while snacking nearly constantly, which has put her on the heavier side. Sami has plenty of skinny enemies who have made fun of her plump weight and are prime targets to test out her new powerâ¦


Amanda: 132 pounds. The cool, young teacher at her new school, Amanda wants to use her new power to teach the image-obsessed female students a lesson theyâll never forget; that no matter how badly you tease the chubby girls, your baby fat will catch up with you and multiply a hundredfoldâ¦


Lana: 112 pounds. One of the most popular girls at school, Lanaâs going to use her new power to boost her own ego and make all of the girls she hates as fat as they can get. But can she pull it off without putting on a few pounds herself?


Christie: 187 pounds. Working at a pastry shop, Christie mindlessly eats the food when she waits for customers to come in; therefore, her waistline is a bitâ¦ large, to say the least. But her job has given her a newfound love of eating, and sheâs trying to gain more weight so that she can have room for secondsâ¦ and thirdsâ¦ and fourthsâ¦ and fifthsâ¦ and her new power can only be a help. Besides, if her customers are hungry, she gets money...

Angela: 105 pounds. An angel bored with heaven, Angela has come down to Earth. However, her friend Matt (the angel in charge of punishing the gluttonous) has given her the gaining power as a parting gift. But one Earth custom is especially new to her- you don't need food in heaven, and it turns out that Angela likes it. Is she ready to become a fat angel?

Lauren: 157 pounds. A competitive swimmer, Lauren has always felt uncomfortable in a bikini due to her size. But now, with the Gaining Power, she can make everyone else so big that she'll be the skinniest girl in the league!

Maddie: 117 pounds. A pirate girl who's always found life on the seven seas stressful. She loves to eat, but never has room for it. One of he rival pirates is so fat that she can barely move; if she can get her other enemies that big, they couldn't fight and she'd be the most powerful pirate on the seas! But when Maddie uses the power, will some rub off on her?

Paige: 476 pounds. Being morbidly obese at high school can be tough. School lunches are always fattening, you don't have any friends, and the lunch tables are going to break under your fat ass if you keep growing. But Paige has loved her fat body for her whole life; she was definitely the only girl who weighed 254 pounds at 8 years old she could think of. At Thanksgiving, Paige gets her own feast. The other girls at school don't aprreciate her lifestyle, but she'll show them...

Lori: 136 pounds. Lori has been mistaken for fat before. After all, with boobs the size of beach balls, anyone would think that some would fill out her belly or ass. But when she discovers that a lot of men like their eye candy big and soft, Lori's on a mission to get huge; and she's bringing her stick-like stripper friend Hillary along for the ride...
